fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Attack a player during the night, dealing your attack value to them.
-If you have received at least 4 individual pings total, you may mark one player each day by pinging them. Marked players secretly have their defense reduced to Vulnerable the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-For every 4 pings you receive in game channels, regardless of whether it comes from the host or another player, you may choose to upgrade either your attack or defense by one level, up to Overkill and Overprotective respectively.
-Reply pings count.
-The host should not ping you by your request.
-Self-pings do not count.
-Pings that target all players (including pings by the host) count for your upgrades, but not for the marking ability or goal.
-You may choose what Neutral role your attack appears to come from.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Every player who has individually pinged you in a game channel must be dead at the end of the game. Except the host. You can kill them after the game ends ðŸ™‚
